= Seam Checklist: API to Database
:checklist:

== Pre-Implementation

* [ ] Repository pattern is defined
* [ ] Query interfaces are documented
* [ ] Error types are specified

== Implementation

* [ ] All queries go through repository
* [ ] No raw SQL in API handlers
* [ ] Connection pooling is used

== Post-Implementation

* [ ] Integration tests cover boundary
* [ ] Performance benchmarks added
